hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
rm -rf $WORKSPACE/* . /root/dp/func-client.sh && prepare_env cd /root/dp/testing/perfcake
# CLIENT prepare rm -f ~/dp/stats/* rm -f scenarios/$SCENARIO/*.csv cat /sys/devices/system/cpu/online start_monitoring
# SERVER prepare ssh $SERVER_HOST /bin/bash <<EOF . /root/dp/func-server.sh && prepare_env dp/prepare-echo-server.sh </dev/null rm -f ~/dp/stats/* start_monitoring EOF
# START THE BENCHMARK, blocks ./start.sh $SCENARIO
# SERVER stop ssh $SERVER_HOST /bin/bash <<EOF . /root/dp/func-server.sh && prepare_env dp/stop-echo-server.sh stop_monitoring EOF
# CLIENT stop stop_monitoring
cd $WORKSPACE # COLLECT OUTPUT mv /root/dp/testing/perfcake/scenarios/$SCENARIO/*.csv . scp $SERVER_HOST:dp/jboss-eap-6.3/standalone/log/server.log . scp $SERVER_HOST:dp/stats/* . cp /root/dp/stats/* .
